title: Introduction to rspacer
text: use rspacer needs know two things: API URL RSpace instance (typically URL RSpace instance followed api/v1, e.g. https://leiden.researchspace.com/api/v1) API key, authentication token can use instead username password. create API key go ‘Manage API Key’ section RSpace profile page (MyRSpace -> Profile). keep API key private. can regenerate API key time, invalidate old key. can use set_api_url() set_api_key() function make available rspacer current session. make information persistent can store environment variables. easy way usethis::edit_r_environ(); file opens, add following lines (insert URL key): saving file restarting R, now able run

title: Introduction to rspacer
text: Now can use rspacer interact RSpace Workspace. example, folder_tree() show content Workspace tibble: can also specify id Unique ID (globalId) show contents specific folder:
code: folder_tree() #> # A tibble: 10 × 9 #>        id globalId name              created lastModified parentFolderId type  `_links` #>     <int> <chr>    <chr>             <chr>   <chr>                 <int> <chr> <list>   #>  1 356307 SD356307 Gerhard Burger    2024-0… 2024-01-17T…           7813 DOCU… <list>   #>  2 260004 FL260004 LACDR RDM         2023-1… 2023-11-06T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  3 242175 FL242175 GABi001_EMP_regu… 2023-0… 2023-06-14T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  4 242400 FL242400 Ontologies        2023-0… 2023-06-01T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  5 242398 FL242398 Api Inbox         2023-0… 2023-06-01T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  6 242182 FL242182 Publications      2023-0… 2023-05-30T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  7  21961 FL21961  DDS2 Data manage… 2023-0… 2023-03-16T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  8   7833 FL7833   Templates         2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #>  9   7819 GF7819   Gallery           2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #> 10   7814 FL7814   Shared            2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7813 FOLD… <list>   #> # ℹ 1 more variable: owner <list> folder_tree(7819) #> # A tibble: 8 × 9 #>      id globalId name   created lastModified parentFolderId type  `_links` owner        #>   <int> <chr>    <chr>  <chr>   <chr>                 <int> <chr> <list>   <list>       #> 1  7828 GF7828   Snipp… 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 2  7827 GF7827   PdfDo… 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 3  7826 GF7826   Misce… 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 4  7825 GF7825   Docum… 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 5  7824 GF7824   Chemi… 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 6  7823 GF7823   Videos 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 7  7822 GF7822   Audios 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list> #> 8  7820 GF7820   Images 2022-1… 2022-12-22T…           7819 FOLD… <list>   <named list>

title: Introduction to rspacer
text: can retrieve documents using result json converted R list, get field information use
code:
res <- document_retrieve("SD356307") summary(res) #> Length Class Mode #> id 1 -none- numeric #> globalId 1 -none- character #> name 1 -none- character #> created 1 -none- character #> lastModified 1 -none- character #> parentFolderId 1 -none- numeric #> signed 1 -none- logical #> tags 0 -none- NULL #> tagMetaData 0 -none- NULL #> form 10 -none- list #> owner 10 -none- list #> fields 8 -none- list #> _links 1 -none- list library(tidyverse) tibble(fields = res$fields) |> unnest_wider(fields) |> select(name, type, content) #> # A tibble: 8 × 3 #> name type content #> #> 1 Template Used string "LACDR-ISA - Contact v0.2.0" #> 2 Name string "Gerhard A. Burger" #> 3 Email string "g.a.burger@lacdr.leidenuniv.nl" #> 4 Phone string "" #> 5 ORCID string "0000-0003-1062-5576" #> 6 Address text "

7 Affiliation string "Leiden University" #> 8 Roles text ""

title: Introduction to rspacer
text: WORK PROGRESS Creating documents currently possible using (unexported) low level rspacer:::document_post() function. example, following code create Basic Document ‘ApiInbox’ folder document_create_from_html() wrapper around function creates body HTML file (e.g. generated quarto) splitting html h2 tag. Note template used MUST number fields sections HTML file. info see https://community.researchspace.com/public/apiDocs [POST /documents].
code: # construct body body_r <- list(   name = "rspacer_create_doc",   tags = "API",   fields = list(     list(content = "Creating a document using rspacer is not (yet) easy")   ) ) res <- rspacer:::document_post(body_r) #> Document created: <https://leiden.researchspace.com/globalId/SD376167>

title: Authors and Citation
text: Gerhard Burger. Author, maintainer. Hanneke Leegwater. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Burger G, Leegwater H (2024). rspacer: RSpace API Wrapper. R package version 0.1.0.9001, https://burgerga.github.io/rspacer/, https://github.com/burgerga/rspacer.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rspacer: RSpace API Wrapper},   author = {Gerhard Burger and Hanneke Leegwater},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0.9001, https://burgerga.github.io/rspacer/},   url = {https://github.com/burgerga/rspacer}, }

title: RSpace API Wrapper
text: goal rspacer wrap RSpace API, , allow use API directly R using convenience functions.

title: RSpace API Wrapper
text: can install development version rspacer

title: RSpace API Wrapper
text: See Get started article use package. NB: API Paging/rate limiting properly handled yet, can worked around.

what: Function to check availability of the API service — api_status
title: Function to check availability of the API service — api_status
text: Function check availability API service

title: Function to check availability of the API service — api_status
Function to check availability of the API service — api_status
text: api_key RSpace API key

title: Function to check availability of the API service — api_status
code: api_status() #> Error in get_api_url(): Please set env var `RSPACE_API_URL` to your RSpace API url #> See `rspacer::set_api_url()` for more information.

what: Get the form id used for a document — doc_to_form_id

text: Get form id used document

title: Get the form id used for a document — doc_to_form_id
Get the form id used for a document — doc_to_form_id
text: doc_id Unique identifier document verbose whether print matching document/form api_key RSpace API key

what: Upload an Excel, csv or tsv document to Rspace — document_create_from_excel
title: Upload an Excel, csv or tsv document to Rspace — document_create_from_excel
text: function can upload Excel/csv/tabular files Rspace structured documents. file needs exactly two columns, one Rspace structured document fields one content.

title: Upload an Excel, csv or tsv document to Rspace — document_create_from_excel
code: document_create_from_excel(   path,   template_id = NULL,   folder_id = NULL,   tags = NULL,   attachment = NULL,   api_key = get_api_key(),   existing_document_id = NULL )

title: Upload an Excel, csv or tsv document to Rspace — document_create_from_excel
text: path Tabular file api_key RSpace API key

title: Upload an Excel, csv or tsv document to Rspace — document_create_from_excel
code: excel_to_doc_body("assay_with_information.xlsx") #> Error in excel_to_doc_body("assay_with_information.xlsx"): could not find function "excel_to_doc_body"

what: Upload a html document to Rspace — document_create_from_html
title: Upload a html document to Rspace — document_create_from_html
text: function can upload html document (e.g., generated quarto) Rspace Basic Document, Structured Document template also provided.

title: Upload a html document to Rspace — document_create_from_html
code: document_create_from_html(   path,   template_id = NULL,   folder_id = NULL,   tags = NULL,   attachment = NULL,   api_key = get_api_key(),   existing_document_id = NULL )

title: Upload a html document to Rspace — document_create_from_html
text: path html document upload template_id document id RSpace template used folder_id folder_id document created (can notebook) tags vector tags apply document attachment attachment attach one fields, e.g., list(field = 7, path = "file.txt") api_key RSpace API key existing_document_id want replace document new one, specify current identifier .

title: Global search for a term — document_search
text: Global search term, works identically simple "" search RSpace Workspace. Must >= 3 characters long.

title: Get the RSpace API key — get_api_key
text: Gets RSpace API key RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable. See set_api_key() set .

Get the RSpace API key — get_api_key
code: # \donttest{ get_api_key() #> Error in get_api_key(): Please set env var `RSPACE_API_KEY` to your RSpace API key #> See `rspacer::set_api_key()` for more information. # }

what: Set the RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable — set_api_key
title: Set the RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable — set_api_key
text: Sets RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable provided RSpace API key. create API key go 'Manage API Key' section profile page (MyRSpace -> Profile).

title: Set the RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable — set_api_key
Set the RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable — set_api_key
text: rspace_api_key RSpace API key

title: Set the RSPACE_API_KEY environment variable — set_api_key
text: set environment variable current session, set permanently, add RSPACE_API_KEY=<your_api_key_here> .Renviron file, example, using usethis::edit_r_environ().

what: Set the RSPACE_API_URL environment variable — set_api_url
title: Set the RSPACE_API_URL environment variable — set_api_url
text: Sets RSPACE_API_URL environment variable provided RSpace API URL. RSpace API URL likely URL RSpace instance followed api/v1.

title: Set the RSPACE_API_URL environment variable — set_api_url
Set the RSPACE_API_URL environment variable — set_api_url
text: rspace_api_url RSpace API URL

title: Set the RSPACE_API_URL environment variable — set_api_url
text: set environment variable current session, set permanently, add RSPACE_API_URL=<your_api_url_here> .Renviron file, example, using usethis::edit_r_environ().

title: Set the RSPACE_API_URL environment variable — set_api_url
